snippet.title: Black Hole Raids are coming to Asteroid!
snippet.description:
"Black Hole Raids" are boss fights that take place in black holes: portals that lead to parallel dimensions and the Void. Defeat Boss Starships and Black Hole Motherships alone or with friends* to earn rewards!

Asteroid™: The Burning Planet, along with the "Star Collector" and "Black Hole Raids" Global Challenge events, will be available in free-to-play on August 26, 2022.

The following languages will be available at launch: Italian, English. More languages and more information will be released in the future.

*Asteroid ™ Online, taking advantage of the Alestore Online Play™ service, will arrive in 2023. Therefore, solo mode will be available for now.

Title: Asteroid™
Genre: Adventure Action RPG
Release date: August 26, 2022
PEGI™ 7

- ASTEROID -
Official website: https://alestoregames.wixsite.com/ast...
Itch.io page: https://alestore-inc.itch.io/asteroid
